book.synopsis: Showcases the eccentric residents of the fictional High Chaparral Trailer Park of Pangburn, Arkansas, a community filled with sex, murder, topless dancing, secrets, and adultery, as they dish the dirt on their neighbors and provide such cost-effective recipes as Spam Rolls, Mayonnaises Cake, All Day Crock Pot Delight, and Honky Tonkin
s Down Home Trailer Park Cookbook
